divs: Sighting Detailsi was outside my yard taking random pictures of the clear night sky.i have a cannon digital powershot a3300is.16.0 mega pixels.i took about a a dozen or so pictures,then i caught a picture of 2 objects in the night sky.one is a white round object and the other looked like a bright red orb.the orb seemed to be in front of the round white object.i did not see this with my naked eyes.it just showed up in the picture.i took several more pictures in the same direction about 50-55 degrees up the horizon.it was shot at 11;41 pm.the time on the camera was one hour off because i never reset it.the moon did not come up until approximately 1:30 am in the opposite direction from where i took the pic.so the bright round object was not the moon.the moon when it did show up was not full.the white object is clearly round.the bright red orb seemed to be closer than the white one.in all i took about 50-60 pictures and nothing else showed up.this was july 28,2013 at 11:41pm.i was and still am a little shook up about it,seeing it appeared so close to me.i have no software or any kind of trickery to produce this.truthfully i am a computer misfit.i only know the basics,finding websites,e-mail ect.i have gone out several other nights and nothing showed up except little white orbs all in my trees.all different sizes.i dont know what they are either.so,thats my story and im sticking to it.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Mills River
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: shot with digital camera.shooting night sky.did not see with eyes.randomly shooting sky.
